title: Understanding Digital Communication Ecology: Applying Cybernetics-Based Informal Pedagogical Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course exploring digital literacy and communication ecosystems in smartphone-centric limited-tech environments, supporting incremental learner growth through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key components of the digital communication ecosystem (technological, cultural, institutional elements).
Learners can model interaction patterns in digital environments by applying cybernetic principles.
Learners can visualize and interpret digital information flows using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
